name: UP02 Crystal Cavern
description:
Welcome to the "Udemy Project" Crystal Cavern.

It's a second project from GameDev.Tv Unreal Blueprints course. This project is part of my own big series "UP" where I decided to make and finish small game projects.

The goals that I set for myself:
  1. Create prototype like Crystal Cavern from GameDev.tv course
  2. Keep basic game design from course
  3. Use Unreal Engine 4 (4.25) and Blueprints ONLY
  4. Learn more about Blueprints and Unreal Editor
  5. Practice with level design and game design
  6. Try to use Houdini Engine
  7. Save & Load System
  8. A few UMG
  9. Draw a concept art and illustrations for this project
  10. FINISH THIS PROJECT
What I have planned and didn't do:
  • Music and sounds
  • More assets
  • More effects and juicy camera
Assets that I used in this project:
  • Models, textures, VFX from StrategyGame
  • Rocks, wood from SoulCave
  • Walls, pillars, stones from Multistory Dungeons
